sentences.en: A dorsiventrally flattened structure has flat dorsal and ventral surfaces and very narrow lateral surfaces.
sentences.cn: 异面平滑结构指有平滑的背、腹面,以及非常狭窄的侧表面.

sentences.en: Anterior ( Ventral, Front ) Nearer to the front of the body is anterior.
sentences.cn: 前 ( 腹侧, 前面 ) 靠近身体正面为前.

sentences.en: Conclusion: MRI showed cerebellar hemisphere, ventral pons, middle cerebelllar peduncles and olive atrophies in OPCA patients.
sentences.cn: 结论: OPCA的MR表现 主要为小脑半球 、 桥脑腹侧 、 小脑中脚和延髓橄榄的萎缩.

sentences.en: Female has shorter wings and no ventral spine.

sentences.cn: 腹疝,大网膜经缺损的腹直肌鞘突出.

sentences.en: It is speculated that ventral muscles may have more function in trunk stabilization than dorsal muscles.
sentences.cn: 腹侧肌,特别是腹壁斜和横肌,比其它躯干肌参与更多的躯干稳定功能,尤其见于轻负重侧放情况.

sentences.en: Its sucking mouth was in a terminal rather than a ventral position.
sentences.cn: 它的吸嘴位于末端,而不在腹部.

sentences.en: Objective Summarize the characteristics and optimum surgical therapies of ventral digital scar contracture of infant.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨小儿手指掌侧瘢痕挛缩的特点和最佳手术方法.

sentences.en: That part is the ventral visual pathway.
sentences.cn: 我们称这一部分为腹侧视觉途径.

sentences.en: The liver is somewhat ventral in position.

sentences.en: Ventral ( or pelvic ) fins correspond to the hind limbs of a quadruped.
sentences.cn: 腹鳍 对应着四足动物的后肢.
